A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly didn’t know what to think after the late night premiere\, after watching it the second time I enjoyed the film more. Granted there are some flaws\, didn’t like how quickly Snoke was killed \, no back story of him\,Rey’s parents didn’t live up to the hype\, but it’s Star Wars 2017\, not 1977\, there will never be another Empire Strikes Back\,there’s too much access to information\, Ground yourself and enjoy it have fun. May the Force Be with You...
